detailed_mitigations.business_risk: Brute force attacks, unauthorized access, potential data breach

detailed_mitigation.primary_solution: Implement FIDO2 multi-factor authentication with account lockout
implementation_steps: Deploy FIDO2 hardware tokens to all users ($75 per token)
Configure Azure AD/Okta with WebAuthn support ($5-10 per user/month)
Set account lockout: 3 failed attempts = 15 minute lockout
Enable real-time login monitoring with SIEM alerts
Implement privileged access management for admin accounts
detailed_mitigation.success_metrics: Reduce brute force success by 99%, <1% false positives

detailed_mitigations.business_risk: Supply chain attacks, malicious code injection, complete system compromise

detailed_mitigation.primary_solution: HSM-based firmware signing with cryptographic verification
implementation_steps: Deploy Hardware Security Module (Thales SafeNet: $25,000-50,000)
Establish PKI infrastructure for code signing certificates
Create firmware signing workflow with dual-approval process
Implement boot-time signature verification on all devices
Deploy firmware integrity monitoring agents
Configure automatic quarantine for unsigned firmware
detailed_mitigation.success_metrics: 100% firmware signature verification, zero bypass incidents
detailed_mitigation.compliance: Meets NIST Cybersecurity Framework, IEC 62443 standards

detailed_mitigations.business_risk: Intellectual property theft, competitive advantage loss, regulatory fines

detailed_mitigation.primary_solution: Data Loss Prevention (DLP) with network monitoring
implementation_steps: Deploy network DLP sensors (Symantec/Forcepoint: $50,000-100,000)
Configure data classification policies for sensitive content
Set egress rate limits: 100MB/hour baseline with exceptions
Implement Cloud Access Security Broker (CASB) for cloud services
Deploy User Behavior Analytics (UBA) for anomaly detection
Configure real-time alerts for large transfers >500MB
detailed_mitigation.success_metrics: Block 95% unauthorized transfers, detect within 2 minutes
detailed_mitigation.compliance: Supports GDPR, CCPA, HIPAA data protection

detailed_mitigations.business_risk: Quality issues, safety incidents, production downtime, regulatory violations

detailed_mitigation.primary_solution: Digital signature system with dual-operator approval
implementation_steps: Implement digital signature infrastructure for parameter changes
Configure two-person integrity (dual-approval) workflow
Deploy real-time parameter monitoring with baseline comparison
Create comprehensive audit trail for all modifications
Implement automated rollback for unauthorized changes
Set up emergency override procedures with enhanced logging
detailed_mitigation.success_metrics: 100% authorized changes, detect drift within 30 seconds
detailed_mitigation.compliance: FDA 21 CFR Part 11, ISO 9001 quality standards
